players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead so suddenly. Let's be cautious and make sure we don't let any mafia members slip through our grasp."
You: "I saw Diana last night near the well. She seemed fine, but I'm not sure if that's relevant."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie and found he's the mafioso. Alice, did you see anything suspicious about Diana near the well last night?"
Charlie: "I'm glad we were able to uncover the truth about Diana's death so early in the game. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure no one else tries to deceive us."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
